TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsSignUnspecifiedByte extends System.Object
public ref class IsSignUnspecifiedByte abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示某個修飾詞既非 signed 也不是 unsigned。

span.span: Indicates that a modifier is neither signed nor unsigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些程式語言，例如 c + +，辨識三個相異`char`值： `signed char`， `unsigned char`，和`char`。Some programming languages, such as C++, recognize three distinct `char` values: `signed char`, `unsigned char`, and `char`. 若要區分的未修改`char`輸入與其他，Microsoft c + + 編譯器會新增修飾詞，以每個`char`發出的組件的型別。To distinguish the unmodified `char` type from the others, the Microsoft C++ compiler adds the modifier to each `char` type emitted to an assembly. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器在沒有適當的預設行為時，會處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的 custom 修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以自訂修飾詞套用至方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以將自訂修飾詞發出至中繼資料，使用下列技巧的其中一個：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法這類類別， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`並`modreq`，並組合的檔案[Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立組件中的類別命名空間，並發出該組件的修飾詞。The following code example creates an assembly using classes in the namespace and emits the modifier into that assembly. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
